title: Constructivist Scaffold-Based Aseptic Compounding Practical Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmaceutical theory and understanding of laboratory safety protocols
context.additional_context: Students experience aseptic compounding environments through VR simulations, practicing under clinically realistic conditions. Constructivist scaffolding is provided in progressive stages

learning_goals: Students can perform aseptic compounding techniques with over 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment
Learners can independently analyze and apply hygiene management procedures through five or more stages using a checklist-based assessment rubric
Learners can pass media fill tests and glove finger sampling tests with at least 90% and 80% pass rates, respectively, on the first attempt
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
